title: Osho_The Sword and The Lotus -05 -men-women (1986)
description:
Osho_The Sword and the Lotus-05 men -women

talks in Nepal, 24 January 1986 am

Something of the sacred

Question 1:

BELOVED MASTER,

WOULD YOU PLEASE EXPLAIN WHAT THE REAL DIFFERENCES BETWEEN MEN AND WOMEN ARE?

The psychology movement is basically male chauvinist, and strangely, it has exploited women more than men.

Most of the differences between men and women are because of thousands of years of conditioning.

They are not fundamental to nature, but there are a few differences which give them unique beauty, individuality. Those differences can be counted very easily.

One is that the woman is capable of producing life; man is not....
 
Read all text of this chapter:
